programme.sub-title: England v South Africa: Match One.
programme.desc: England v South Africa. All the action from the opening match of the three-game series at the Ageas Bowl, the home of Hampshire CCC. The last time these sides contested a T20 series in England was in 2012, with the first game at Durham's Chester-le-Street seeing the tourists win comfortably by seven wickets. ATP 500 Queens: 2x
programme.desc: Turnir v Queensu so prvič organizirali že leta 1890, do danes pa je postal eden najprestižnejših v travnatem delu sezone. Čeprav je tik pred zdajci svoj nastop odpovedal Rafael Nadal, bo imel Andy Murray vse prej kot lahko delo, če bo želel ubraniti naslov, saj so svoj prihod napovedali še trije člani prve deseterice: Stan Wawrinka, Miloš Raonić in Marin Čilić. Bo Murray znova navdušil navijače v Londonu?

programme.title: Evroliga: Pregled sezone 2016/2017
programme.desc: Vsi vrhunci evroligaške sezone, ki se je končala z zmago Fenerbahčeja, zbrani na enem mestu

programme.title: ATP 500 Queens: 2x

programme.title: NBA Inside Stuff, 24. del

programme.title: Italjanska liga - Finale (6. tekma): Trentino - Venezia
programme.desc: Potem ko je Milano povsem odpovedal v polfinalu proti Trentu, je postalo jasno, da bomo v Italiji dobili novega prvaka. Trentino šestič ali Venezia tretjič v klubski zgodovini? Eni in drugi v letošnji končnici igrajo izjemno in atraktivno, kar napoveduje nepredvidljivo serijo do samega konca

programme.title: Live! ATP 500 Halle, ATP 500 Queens in WTA Premier Birmingham
programme.desc: Travnata sezona je v polnem teku, saj je turnir v Wimbledonu že pred vrati. Ta teden na programih Sportkluba spremljajte turnirja iz Birminghama (ženske) ter Halleja in Queensa (oba moški). Kdo bo najbolje pripravljen dočakal začetek bojev na sveti travi?

programme.title: Trans World Sport, 1573. del
programme.desc: Šport je sredstvo množic, kjer se sprostijo pozitivna energija in dobro počutje. Tudi zaradi tega je Trans World Sport oddaja, ki je letos praznovala že 28 letnico delovanja

programme.desc: Španska nogometna liga, bolj poznana pod vzdevkom La Liga, je najelitnejše nogometno tekmovanje v Španiji. Ustanovljena je bila leta 1929. V ligi nastopa 20 klubov, kjer vsako sezono nekdo postane prvak in izpade v špansko drugo ligo. Najuspešnejša kluba sta madridski Real in Barcelona. Skupaj sta ligo osvojila kar 55 krat. Zadnji naslov je romal v roke Barcelone(n)

Tour de Suisse: 9. etapa (kronometer)
programme.desc: Kolesarska dirka po Švici bo tudi tokrat poskrbela za navdušenje kolesarskih navdušencev. Z razgibanimi etapami, ki pogosto zavijejo visoko v gore, se bodo spopadli nekateri od najboljših kolesarjev na svetu, marsikdo pa bo dirko po deželi čokolade izkoristil tudi za pripravo na dirko po Franciji. Pred letom dni je bil najboljši Miguel Angel Lopez. Kdo bo najhitrejši letos?(n)

programme.title: Champions Tour Learning Center *
programme.desc: Fresh off his U.S. Open appearance, Wisconsin native Steve Stricker helps preview this week's American Family Insurance Championship from Madison. Fellow Wisconsin native Jerry Kelly shows us how he's implementing more rotation into his swing. Jeff Sluman, who won twice in Wisconsin on the PGA TOUR, explains how he's using technology to hone his swing, and two-time Travelers winner Peter Jacobsen has instruction on ball position on short chip shots around the green. (cc)

programme.desc: Part 2. Bill teams up again with his good fishing buddies Bob Bagby, VP of marketing for Zebco-Quantum brands, and Rich Tudor, co-host of Saltwater Experience, to go after feisty barracudas in the Florida Keys(n)

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor travel deep into the Everglades to catch tarpon from a paddle board(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Captain Scott Walker and Captain Steve Rodger fish for table fare in Key West(n)

programme.title: Reel Time With Florida Sportsman
programme.desc: Captain George Gozdz travels to Yankeetown to meet the locals and fish the backcountry(n)

programme.title: Sporting Chef
programme.desc: Chef Leysath takes a detour on the way to an African safari to discover how they prepare wild game and fish below the equator. Gemsbuck, kudu, oryx, kingklip and more are on the menu. Also, plenty of South African wine(n)

programme.title: THE LIFE at Table Mountain
programme.desc: Some alone time for Scott and Angie as they head out on a hunt of their own and searching for elk and mule deer with their Mathews bows(n)

programme.title: Easton Bowhunting TV
programme.desc: Fred calls bulls in close for himself and clients on this Colorado elk hunting trip(n)

programme.title: Guns & Ammo TV
programme.desc: A look at a group of new products to go along with a review of Hornady's reworked and modernized .25-35 factory load. Later, we confront the unthinkable: an assailant who is wearing body armor(n)

programme.title: GunVenture
programme.desc: Machine gun rentals at Scottsdale; a grand tour in Denver; and a stop in Talladega for some e-target shooting(n)

programme.title: Guns & Gear
programme.desc: Shooting Colt's combat-driven pistol. Also: the Ruger American rifle; V-Grip lasers for NAA revolvers from LaserLyte; and DoubleTap Ammunition in .327 Federal(n)

programme.title: The Hunt for Big Fish With Larry Dahlberg
programme.desc: Part 1. Larry fishes for giant Nile perch upon his return to Lake Nasser in Egypt(n)

programme.title: One More Cast With Shaw Grigsby
programme.desc: Shaw heads to Venice, La. for redfish(n)

programme.title: Bowhunter TV
programme.desc: In celebration of 13 years in TV production, Curt Wells takes viewers for a walk down memory lane to re-live some of the staff's big-game encounters(n)

programme.title: North American Whitetail Television
programme.desc: The North American Whitetail team heads for home in pursuit of whitetail bucks on familiar ground; Stan Potts debates archery releases; and Dr. James Kroll and Pat Hogan plant cool-season food plots(n)

programme.title: McMillan
programme.desc: A first-timer proves that it is not the size of the trophy, but the experience that counts when it comes to whitetail hunting in Kansas(n)

programme.title: Monster Bucks
programme.desc: David Blanton of Whitetail Properties reflects on some of his best hunts ever(n)

programme.title: Trained Assassins
programme.desc: The crew highlights the best of 2016 turkey season(n)

programme.title: Major League Bowhunter
programme.desc: Part 3. After Chipper harvests his biggest buck, Brandon Danker closes the chapter on the Mahuka saga(n)

programme.title: Huntin' the Backwoods
programme.desc: Ohio's archery season is finally here. Cincinnati Bengals center Russell Bodine starts the season off on opening weekend by hunting over a productive food plot. Then, Pat McKenna and Paul Payne score big on Ohio bucks(n)

programme.title: Night Crew
programme.desc: The crew brings the world of night hunting into the light(n)
